entry.title: Friday: Snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow squalls ending early this morning then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 70 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
